entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:50 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of showers. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
